java112.analyzer

Class SummaryReport

  • java.lang.Object
    • java112.analyzer.SummaryReport
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Analyzer

    public class SummaryReport
extends java.lang.Object
implements Analyzer
    The SummaryReport class will implement the Analyzer interface and print a summary report to a file called summary_report.text
    Author:
    sschwert

        public void printSummaryReport(java.io.PrintWriter writer,

        the printSummaryReport method writes the summary report to the file using the properties.getProperty method and retrieves the absolute path of the file
